g1.title: Core Parser Infrastructure
g1.description: Complete the core TSK parser with lexer, semantic analyzer, and error handling. Must handle all TSK syntax variations and provide comprehensive error reporting.

g2.title: Configuration Management System
g2.description: Implement hierarchical configuration system with .tsk file support, environment overrides, and validation. Must support all TuskLang configuration patterns.

g3.title: Binary Format & Serialization
g3.description: Complete binary format compiler and loader with versioning, compression, and cross-platform compatibility. Must handle all TSK data types efficiently.

g4.title: Connection & Session Management
g4.description: Implement robust connection pooling, session management, and network resilience patterns. Must support distributed TSK operations and failover.
